name: Norwegian Visual Artists Copyright Society (BONO)
membership: Reciprocal and unilateral agreements with similar societies worldwide. Also member of CISAC, EVA (European Visual Artists) and OLA (OnLine Art).
goal:
Norwegian Visual Artists Copyrights Society (BONO), established in 1992, is a Collective Managment Organisation for Visual Artists. Our society administers the copyright to the works of more than 2.300 Norwegian visual artists. Through agreements with foreign sister-societies it additionally represents more than 100.000 foreign artists in Norway.

Norwegian Visual Artists Copyright Society (BONO) ensures easy licensing of the works of visual artists it represents, and is also responsible for administering the resale right in Norway.
euInitiatives: Information society, intellectual property, copyright, resale right, digital single market
